text: [Music] initially people thought that disability is a curse but i have changed the perception of the community and now they're accepting that examinations are our only few challenge work instead i know i work differently so i do my things differently but i am a person like any other person my dad used to tell me to do farming but i was not interested i thought it was very dirty that's why i did i.t so i wanted to do anything to do technology and computers behind the desktop and studying other things now my it background assists me a lot because i learn online i market my produce technology has come to change what my dad used to do and i can change family water whatever i'm doing here i can sell it online instead of now taking my vegetables to the market they are collected from home you get your money quietly with no disturbance and you can go somewhere with a girl the purpose you know that's why you find me having these pigs feeding them like my babies you know you must love whatever you do once you change the mindset and and you know you love whatever you're doing you achieve a lot young people believe that naropa is the only place where you can make money or you can get employed i take advantage of being next to nairobi because most people in nairobi feed from here that was also another reason why i tended to do family for the youth now they should also know that ugly business is also an employment if you exist where we're in agribusiness you can get as much as you would wish to get so you should come over and join me during farming [Music]
